title: No confirmation dialog when deleting messages from search results
content:
I am getting no confirmation when I am deleting messages from the search results screen.

Reproduction steps

  1. Write something findable to the search field (at the top) and press Enter
  2. Select Show results as list
  3. Select one or more messages
  4. Press Shift+Delete

Expected behavior

A dialog window Confirm Deletion should appear just like when I am deleting messages directly from mailboxes.

Actual behavior

The message is deleted immediately.

Environment $ lsb_release -a No LSB modules are available. Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 22.04.4 LTS Release: 22.04 Codename: jammy $ uname -r 6.5.0-21-generic $ thunderbird --version Thunderbird 115.8.1
